short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension parses and sends HTML data from competitive programming websites to the CP Edge case extension of VS Code.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When using the feature of automatically generating `Test case generator file` in CP Edge Case (https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=KishleshSingh.cp-edge-case)  this extension is required. This extension sends problem data to VS Code extension to extract test case description and generate prompt for Copilot.
